article:
Mrs. Smith is a doctor. She has a son. _ name is Bruce. She and Bruce like _ very much. So Mrs. Smith often goes to the _ to see animals with Bruce on Sundays.
Today is Sunday. Mrs. Smith _ have to go to work. She gets up at seven. She wants to go to the zoo with her _ . They have breakfast at a quarter _ seven. Then they take a bus to the zoo. They _ there at half past eight.
Bruce's favorite animals are _ So they go to see the Panda Show first . The pandas _ very cute and funny  . Bruce takes some photos of the pandas. Mrs. Smith and Bruce are in the zoo for about two _ . They have a very happy time in the zoo.
